name: Liquidity.money
description: What is the project about? Liquidity Money: Unleashing the Power of Decentralized Liquidity Pools on Ethereum What makes your project unique? Operating on the Ethereum network, Liquidity Money brings forth a novel approach to liquidity pools, systematically remedying security vulnerabilities and challenges linked with decentralization. History of your project. No Whatâ€™s next for your project? This is our first project. We are very passionate about this project, so the product will be gradually upgraded after launch. What can your token be used for? Holders of LIM tokens will receive LP rewards based on holding dividends. Initial LP: Initial supply liquidity will be used as dividend reward for all $LIM token holders. Distribute 10% every week from the time of launch. 3% Tax: Every Buy/Sell transaction will be charged 3% tax to add to liquidity and get LP tokens back, shortly after that will distribute all these LP tokens to all LIM token holders.
